Lock.description: Prevents a robbery attempt. This item will still be used even if the robber would've paid you

Lock Pick.description: 75% to ignore a lock. In the case that you picked the lock, you do not lose the lock pick

Auto Cash.description: For the next crash game, you will automatically cash out just before the game crashes, but the starting multiplier starts at 0.5

Rlw8 Update.description: When the stock reaches 0, an update will be made to RLWorld8

Increased Income.description: Until the next reset, gain a +5% Credit Earnings perk

Gambler.description: Begging success rate is increased from a 67% to a 70%, Crash rate decreases from a 10% to a 8%, Robbing success rate increases from a 33% to a 40%, and gain a -7.5% Credits Earning perk

Grapher.description:
Gives the following features (for the account):
+ Allows viewing balance graph for others
+ Maximum indexing for balance graph is increased from 1k to 10k
+ Access to the supplygraph (sg) command, providing a graph for every single user and the total credits
